Room.Name: East Ulandia
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the east bank of the Baldywyne River, walking on East Ulandia.
Room.LongDescription: There's a lot of cheering and noise coming from the building to the east. A large poster indicates the building houses a cock fighting arena. The poster says that there is no-limit betting allowed, and your bet of any size will be covered. There's a picture of two fighting cocks staring at each other, and the print underneath says they are both undefeated.
